dkeep.logic

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • dkeep.logic.Game
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class handles all of the game's logic.
    Author:
    José Freixo and Ruben Torres
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • isGameOver

        public boolean isGameOver()
        This method checks if the user lost the level or not.
        Returns:
        boolean Returns true if the user lost, false if otherwise.

      • HeroCaught

        public boolean HeroCaught(CellPosition Guard_or_OgrePos,
                          CellPosition HeroPos)
        This method checks if the hero is near a deadly enemy (ogre swing or guard).
        Parameters:
        Guard_or_OgrePos - The position of the deadly enemy.
        HeroPos - The position of the hero.
        Returns:
        boolean Returns true if the hero was caught, false if otherwise.

      • MoveAllTheOgres

        public void MoveAllTheOgres()
        This method moves all ogres, checks if they get stunned and then swings their clubs.

      • moveOgre

        public void moveOgre(Ogre ogre)
        This method moves a specific ogre, changing it's representation accordingly.
        Parameters:
        ogre - The ogre that shall be moved.

      • ogreSwingClub

        public void ogreSwingClub(Ogre ogre)
        This method swings a specific ogre's club. If the ogre has no valid positions to attack the club is stored on the ogre's position.
        Parameters:
        ogre - The ogre that shall attack.

      • moveHero

        public void moveHero(char c)
        This method moves the hero, checking for special game conditions (Ex: Opening doors, lifting/pushing the key/lever).
        Parameters:
        c - The movement's direction.

      • moveGuard

        public void moveGuard(int[] i)
        This method moves the guard, according to it's personality.
        Parameters:
        i - The index of the guard's next move.

      • stunOgres

        public void stunOgres()
        This method stuns the ogres that are near the hero.

      • EndStatus

        public java.lang.Boolean EndStatus()
        This method returns the current game status.
        Returns:
        Boolean Returns true if the user lost, false if he won the level and stays null until one of the previous 2 happens.

      • areDoorsOpen

        public boolean areDoorsOpen()
        This method returns the door's state.
        Returns:
        boolean Returns true if the doors are open, false if otherwise.

      • getMap

        public GameMap getMap()
        This method returns the current level's map.
        Returns:
        GameMap Returns the current level's map.
